hero.ticker: Available for remote work · Frontend Developer · Based in NRW · Open to work ·

about.title: About me
about.heading: Who I Am
about.intro: Hi, I’m a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Essen. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.

details.location: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Essen and remotely.
details.mindset: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
details.passion: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.heading: Technologies
skills.intro: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.

anotherSkill.question: You need
anotherSkill.contactMessage: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
